enWisdom: Night vigil is the garden of those who yearn [nearness of Allah]
Night vigil is one of the two lives

Wisdom: أَسْهِرُوا عُيُونَكُمْ وَضَمِّرُوا بُطُونَكُمْ وَخُذُوا مِنْ أَجْسَادِكُمْ تَجُودُوا بِهَا عَلَى أَنْفُسِكُمْ
enWisdom: Keep vigil at night and make your stomachs lean; and take away from your bodies so that you may be generous with it upon your souls

Wisdom: أَسْهِرُوا عُيُونَكُمْ وَضَمِّرُوا بُطُونَكُمْ وَخُذُوا مِنْ أَجْسَادِكُمْ تَجُودُوا بِهَا عَلَى أَنْفُسِكُمْ
enWisdom: Keep vigil at night and make your stomachs lean; and take away from your bodies so that you may be generous with it upon your souls

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْعِبَادَةِ سَهَرُ الْعُيُونِ بِذِكْرِ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ
enWisdom: The best of worship is staying awake at night in the remembrance of Allah, the Glorified

Wisdom: سَهَرُ اللَّيْلِ شِعَارُ الْمُتَّقِينَ وَشِيمَةُ الْمُشْتَاقِينَ
enWisdom: Night vigil is the insignia of the pious and the quality of those who yearn

Wisdom: سَهَرُ اللَّيْلِ فِي طَاعَةِ اللَّهِ رَبِيعُ الْأَوْلِيَاءِ وَرَوْضَةُ السُّعَدَاءِ
enWisdom: Keeping vigil at night in the worship of Allah is the spring of the friends [of Allah] and the garden of the felicitous

Wisdom: سَهَرُ الْعُيُونِ بِذِكْرِ اللَّهِ خُلْصَانُ الْعَارِفِينَ وَحُلْوَانُ الْمُقَرَّبِينَ
enWisdom: Keeping vigil at night in the remembrance [and worship] of Allah is the devotion of the Gnostics and the delight of the Near Ones

Wisdom: سَهَرُ اللَّيْلِ بِذِكْرِ اللَّهِ غَنِيمَةُ الْأَوْلِيَاءِ وَسَجِيَّةُ الْأَتْقِيَاءِ
enWisdom: Keeping vigil at night in the remembrance [and worship] of Allah is the prize of the friends [of Allah] and the practice of the God-wary

Wisdom: سَهَرُ الْعُيُونِ بِذِكْرِ اللَّهِ فُرْصَةُ السُّعَدَاءِ وَنُزْهَةُ الْأَوْلِيَاءِ
enWisdom: Keeping vigil at night in the remembrance of Allah is the opportunity of the felicitous and the promenade of the friends [of Allah]

Wisdom: طُوبَى لِعَيْنٍ هَجَرَتْ فِي طَاعَةِ اللَّهِ غُمْضَهَا
enWisdom: Blessed is the eye that forsakes its sleep in obedience [and worship] to Allah

Wisdom: مَنْ كَثُرَ فِي لَيْلِهِ نَوْمُهُ فَاتَهُ مِنَ الْعَمَلِ مَا لَا يَسْتَدْرِكُهُ فِي يَوْمِهِ
enWisdom: One who sleeps a lot at night loses the [opportunity to perform the] deeds that he cannot make up for during the daytime
What a good helper of worship night vigil is!
The early morning hours of Saturdays and Thursdays are a blessing
